name: Snow Your Moves!
description:
Yu wants nothing more than to build a  snowman, but they live in the scorching desert. Help them summon their own snow with a SNOW DANCE!

Instructions:

- When the falling balls reach the arrows at the bottom, press the corresponding key to bust a dance move!

- Successful timing will fill up your snow-meter.

- Stamina is constantly draining.

- You start with nothing, but can purchase upgrades after each loss.


Credits

Made in a few weekends for Gherwit's Cool and Awesome Winter Game Jam:

https://scratch.mit.edu/studios/32644116/

- I made the art with piskelapp.com, and the sound effects with beepbox.co

- Text engine by Fbutlertow

https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/444688072/

- Music by Louie Zong. Its from the "Toad in the Hole" album: https://louiezong.bandcamp.com/album/toad-in-the-hole-gb-soundtrack

- Palette is an edited version of paperback by Doph on Lospec.com: https://lospec.com/palette-list/paperback-2

- Progress bars based on a health bar tutorial by Griffpatch

- Thumbnail fonts are from fontspace.com, dialogue font is from Fbutlertow, info font from scratch, and button font by me (6 fonts for some reason, crazy)
